Posts.Content: I have not had my hair loss YET!!! However I have ordered hair weaves from www.heathershair.co.uk. Arrived within 2 days!! These weaves are an alternative to wigs as I’m not sure how I will get on with one. The weaves are sewn on to soft headbands and the idea is to go under a hat with some hair showing. They do need a little trim when they arrive BUT.... these are totally FREE!!! You pay p&p and they will ask for a donation which is completely up to you. All done by volunteers. I am very pleased so far.
Posts.Title: Wig supplier recommendations - dedicated thread

Posts.Content: I had lumpectomy and then lymph nodes removal last month and in October. Wasn’t told anything about deodorant and just carried on using my usual!! I do use a roll on though so I just roll around the wound/scar!! I’m fine so far
Posts.Title: Post op deodaraunt !

Posts.Content: Thought this chemo was a piece of cake! How wrong am I??? I have got up this morning and just feel awful. I really can’t explain how I feel, no energy, my mouth and tongue feel strange, I’m crying and just now realise this is what I’ve got for the next few months. I have been so positive since diagnosis, I suppose as I didn’t feel ill it has all been a bit surreal until today! Now I just want it all to go away and wonder if I’m going to get through this with my sanity still in place. I know there are people a LOT worse off than me , and much braver, so I’m sorry for whinging
Posts.Title: Day 5/6 of chemo, cannot explain how I feel!!!

Posts.Content: Thanks Cathy, you are so supportive to everyone on here. Was just trying to knit when I saw your message, read it and cried again!!! I think it has hit me how hard this is going to be and I don’t like sitting around, always have to be doing something!!!! I will take on board what you have said and get my positive head back on xx
